SELECT RENT_NO, CHANGE_NAME, RENT_TITLE, RENT_POINT, RENT_DATE, NICKNAME FROM RENT_BOARD R, MEMBER M WHERE R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND R.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY RENT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT_BOARD ( RENT_NO, USER_NO, RENT_TITLE, RENT_CONTENT, RENT_DATE, DUE_DATE, RENT_BOOKTITLE, RENT_POINT, CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_RENNO.NEXTVAL, #{ userNo }, #{ rentTitle }, #{ rentContent }, #{ rentDate }, #{ dueDate }, #{ rentBookTitle }, #{ rentPoint }, #{ changeName } )
mapper.select: SELECT RENT_NO, R.USER_NO, RENT_USERNO, RENT_TITLE, RENT_CONTENT, RENT_POINT, RENT_DATE, DUE_DATE, RENT_BOOKTITLE, CHANGE_NAME, NICKNAME FROM RENT_BOARD R, MEMBER M WHERE R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND R.STATUS = 'N' AND R.RENT_NO = #{rentNo}
